snippet: Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. touted the administration’s economic record and called out Republican candidates by name before a spirited gathering at a United Auto Workers hall.
abstract: Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr, in stump speech to the United Auto Workers Local 12 in Toledo, Ohio, talks up the auto industry, praise Pres Obama's convictions and criticizes Republican presidential candidates for their protection of the rich; speech is billed as the first salvo in a more formal phase of Pres Obama's 2012 campaign.

byline.contributor: Mark Landler contributed reporting from Largo, Md.

lead_paragraph: Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. touted the administration’s economic record and called out Republican candidates by name before a spirited gathering at a United Auto Workers hall.

headline.seo: On the Stump in Toledo, Biden Attacks G.O.P. Rivals
headline.main: On the Stump in Ohio, Biden Attacks G.O.P. Rivals
headline.print_headline: On Stump in Ohio, Biden Attacks G.O.P. Rivals
